publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2210# Donald Gorrie: Return to practice courses for nurses—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to fund free "return to practice" courses with allowances for registered nurses who are not currently working as nurses in order to encourage them to re-enter the nursing profession and notes that funding for this purpose has been made available in England and Wales. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Margaret Smith*, Nora Radcliffe*, Robert Brown*, Tavish Scott*

S1M-2210# Donald Gorrie: Return to practice courses for nurses—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to fund free "return to practice" courses with allowances for registered nurses who are not currently working as nurses in order to encourage them to re-enter the nursing profession and notes that funding for this purpose has been made available in England and Wales. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr Jamie Stone, Margaret Smith, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown, Tavish Scott, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2210# Return to practice courses for nurses (lodged on 12 September 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2210# Return to practice courses for nurses (lodged on 12 September 2001) Iain Smith*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2210# Return to practice courses for nurses (lodged on 12 September 2001) Irene McGugan*

S1M-2210# Donald Gorrie: Return to practice courses for nurses-That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to fund free "return to practice" courses with allowances for registered nurses who are not currently working as nurses in order to encourage them to re-enter the nursing profession and notes that funding for this purpose has been made available in England and Wales. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr Jamie Stone, Margaret Smith, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown, Tavish Scott, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Tommy Sheridan, Iain Smith, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan
S1M-2210# Return to practice courses for nurses (lodged on 12 September 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2210# Return to practice courses for nurses (lodged on 12 September 2001) Robin Harper*
